modName: Main Menu and Town Music Replacer
summary: Main Menu and Town Music Replacer
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/test.png?w=920[/img]

[center][b]This is a two part mod:[/b][/center]

[center][b]It is a Main Menu replacer that changes the wallpaper and music.[/b][/center]
[center][youtube]sDYjNtSrR3Y[/youtube][/center]
[center][b]And[/b][/center]
[center][b]It is a music replacer (only) for Towns, (not villages).[/b][/center]
[center][youtube]GQexg1Rp-G8[/youtube][/center]

[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/quote-divider1.png?w=917[/img]

The music in question is composed and produced by a good friend of mine, one Mr. Ryan Fleming, whose music production is known as 'Solitude Forest'. The aim of this mod is to change the "feel" of the towns in Skyrim by changing the music to something a bit more atmospheric or 'deep'. Ryans music certainly does just that.

[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/quote-divider1.png?w=917[/img]

Artist:
[url=http://solitude-forest.bandcamp.com/]Solitude Forest[/url]

Tracks used in Towns during game play:
[url=http://solitude-forest.bandcamp.com/album/a-celestial-heritage]"A Celestial Heritage,"[/url]

Those tracks are:
[url=https://solitude-forest.bandcamp.com/track/a-celestial-heritage]1 A Celestial Heritage,[/url]
[url=https://solitude-forest.bandcamp.com/track/the-firmament]2 The Firmament,[/url]
[url=https://solitude-forest.bandcamp.com/track/beholding-the-pleiades]3 Beholding The Pleiades,[/url]
[url=https://solitude-forest.bandcamp.com/track/the-daughter-of-heaven-has-fallen-from-the-stars]6 The Daughter Of Heaven Has Fallen From The Stars,[/url]

Track used for the main menu:
[url=https://solitude-forest.bandcamp.com/track/skulls-for-she-who-dwells-at-the-threshold]"Skulls For She Who Dwells At The Threshold."[/url]

Id like to thank Ryan for his general awesomeness, his friendship, and his music.

Ryans Bandcamp profile,
[url=https://solitude-forest.bandcamp.com/]https://solitude-forest.bandcamp.com/[/url]

Ryans Youtube videos,
[url=http://www.youtube.com/user/RyanVonFleming/videos]http://www.youtube.com/user/RyanVonFleming/videos[/url]

[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/quote-divider1.png?w=917[/img]

Image on main menu:
[url=http://piccry.com/royalty-free-space-images/]http://piccry.com/royalty-free-space-images/[/url]

[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/quote-divider1.png?w=917[/img]

I used two of IceKK menu mods:

No Bethesda Logo In Menu
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8023/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8023/?[/url]

No Menu and Loading Smoke
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7901/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7901/?[/url]

[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/quote-divider1.png?w=917[/img]

Compatibility: This mod is not compatible with other mods that 'replace' town music or main menu music. This mod is compatible with all other audio mods.

Installation: Merge this Data folder with the Data folder in your Skyrim directory.

Uninstallation: Remove the folder titled (Music) from your Data folder.

[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/quote-divider1.png?w=917[/img]

As always, your criticism and endorsements are most welcome.

[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/test.png?w=920[/img]
author: Drail3
